mapper.sql: SELECT memberNo, id, password, role, name, postCode, address, email, phone, kidNum, kidAge1, kidAge2, kidAge3, kakaoToken, STATUS, enrollDate, modifyDate, address2 FROM MEMBER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER( memberNo, id, password, role, name, postCode, address, email, phone, kidNum, kidAge1, kidAge2, kidAge3, kakaoToken, STATUS, enrollDate, modifyDate, address2 ) VALUES ( 0, #{id}, #{password}, default, #{name}, #{postCode}, #{address}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{kidNum}, #{kidAge1}, #{kidAge2}, #{kidAge3}, #{kakaoToken}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{address2})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET NAME = #{name}, PHONE = #{phone}, EMAIL = #{email}, POSTCODE = #{postCode}, ADDRESS = #{address}, ADDRESS2 = #{address2}, MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate} WHERE memberNo = #{memberNo}
